titleStmt.title: The arte of happines Consisting of three parts, whereof the first searcheth out the happinesse of man. The second, particularly discouers and approues it- The third, sheweth the meanes to attayne and increase it. By Francis Rous.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

titleStmt.title: The arte of happines Consisting of three parts, whereof the first searcheth out the happinesse of man. The second, particularly discouers and approues it- The third, sheweth the meanes to attayne and increase it. By Francis Rous.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls-Church-yard at the signe of the Ball,

notesStmt.note: The words "the first searcheth .. increase it." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
